quest.name: Curds and Slay
journal: As Bloezoeng eyes you from his corner, you get the impression that he has a dangerous task in mind.

Your wanderings have led you into the company of one Bloezoeng, a local chef in the Seventh Heaven. As it turns out, you and he share a mutual acquaintance: Dyrstweitz, the owner of the Flying Shark in Costa del Sol. Dyrstweitz, it would seem, has sent out a call for help on behalf of his own friend, Wheiskaet. For friendship's sake, seek out Wheiskaet in eastern La Noscea to see what is troubling him.

Wheiskaet has pointed you in the direction of yet another old acquaintance, Brayflox Alltalks from the Company of Heroes. Proceed to Brayflox's Longstop, and assist the goblin in any way you are able.

You speak with Brayflox and discover that her camp is under attack by the Illuminati, a secretive fraternity of goblin scholars. This enigmatic band may well have good reasons for their assault, but in the name of friendship, you must brush such doubts aside as you prepare to stand with Brayflox.

※Brayflox's Longstop (Hard) can be accessed via the Duty Finder.
objectives: Speak with Wheiskaet at Costa del Sol.
Speak with Brayflox at her Longstop.

dialogue.name: BLOEZOENG
dialogue.text: You're Forename Surname, by the onion! The very womanman I seek at Dyrstweitz's behest!

dialogue.name: BLOEZOENG
dialogue.text: How do I know the potbanger? Why, we trained together in the Culinarians' Guild. He has a place in Costa del Sol now─the Flying Shark.

dialogue.name: BLOEZOENG
dialogue.text: Not the sharpest knife in the block is Dyrst the Daft, but he's loyal. He's got a friend out there by the name of Wheiskaet, and he seems to be in need of your help. What say you go look him up, eh?

dialogue.name: WHEISKAET
dialogue.text: Forename Surname! I shall have to thank Dyrstweitz, for he was as good as his word. He promised he'd find you.

dialogue.name: WHEISKAET
dialogue.text: I'm lucky to have such friends? What can I say, in the Company of Heroes, you keep good company, haha! And that's what I need your help with. I'm sure you'll remember Brayflox─in a bit of trouble, she is.

dialogue.name: WHEISKAET
dialogue.text: As the captain of the guards here, I can hardly go charging off to her rescue. Yet, would I forsake a friend? Never! And so I thought of you, Forename.

dialogue.name: WHEISKAET
dialogue.text: Truly, your timing is fortuitous, and your fortitude unmatched. If there is any who can help our mutual gobbie friend, it is you. Now, off you go, then─to Brayflox's Longstop!

dialogue.name: WHEISKAET
dialogue.text: Help Brayflox, old friend. You shall find her at the Longstop, as you did before.

dialogue.name: BRAYFLOX
dialogue.text:
Pshhh... Shkohhh...
Goodly uplander is here to give lenthand to gobbieflock of Brayflox? Uplander's tongueflaps make for happy gobbie!

dialogue.name: BRAYFLOX
dialogue.text: Brayflox ear-catch enemy footnoise! Illuminati want Brayflox's secret. Dirty-take they try and try, pshhh!

dialogue.name: BRAYFLOX
dialogue.text: Stinkysweet secret recipe, Brayflox can give to gobbie friend! Brayflox's cheese is most tastyfresh, and now Brayflox is a hunted gobbie!

dialogue.name: BRAYFLOX
dialogue.text: Brayflox is no cheesemaker─Brayflox free cheese recipe from Illuminati. Cheese is gobbie birthright, no gobbie die make Illuminati cheeselords. But now they want to make Brayflox dead gobbie!

dialogue.name: BRAYFLOX
dialogue.text: Brayflox give uplander lenthand in past-time, yes? Mighty rockman fall with gobbiehelp, yes? Now time is come for lenthand to be Brayflox's ironfist! Shkohhh!
